Welcome to Foobar’s documentation!¶

Contents:

interface foobar.interfaces.IRobot[source]¶

Robots implement this interface.

talk(msg)¶

Make the robot speak the provided text.

Parameters:msg (unicode) – The text to speak.
interface foobar.interfaces.IRobotFactory[source]¶

Create robots providing the IRobot interface.

__call__()¶

Create a new robot.

interface foobar.interfaces.IRobotRunner[source]¶
__call__(robots, msg)¶
Parameters:
  • robots (list of IRobot) – The robots to let talk.
  • msg (unicode) – The text to speak.
